scripts.both:add: cd packages/backend && bun add $1 && cd ../frontend && bun add $1
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd packages/backend && bun install && cd ../frontend && bun install
scripts.install:axios: cd packages/backend && bun add axios && cd ../frontend && bun add axios
scripts.install:date-fns: cd packages/backend && bun add date-fns && cd ../frontend && bun add date-fns
scripts.install:lodash: cd packages/backend && bun add lodash && cd ../frontend && bun add lodash
